entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
